name: goreleaser-installer
author: Engin Diri
instanceNameFormat: GoReleaser is a release automation tool for Go projects

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version of goreleaser to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the goreleaser version to use e.g. 'v0.183.0' (leave blank for latest)

inputs.name: distribution
inputs.label: GoReleaser distribution
inputs.helpMarkDown: GoReleaser distribution, either GoReleaser or GoReleaser Pro
